synopsis.text: Denji is a downtrodden teenager burdened by overwhelming debt inherited from his father. His only companion is his pet devil Pochita, a Chainsaw Devil. To repay his debts, Denji works as a devil hunter for the yakuza, using Pochita's powers to take down devils for money. However, Denji dreams of a simple, peaceful life with good food and a girlfriend. When the yakuza betray and murder Denji, Pochita saves him by merging their bodies together. Reborn as the Chainsaw Man with the power to transform parts of his body into chainsaws, Denji catches the attention of Makima, an elite devil hunter from the Public Safety Bureau. She takes him in on the condition that he works for her. With newfound powers and a promise from Makima for a content life with a beautiful woman, Denji dedicates himself to hunting devils for the bureau. Despite the tragedy he has endured, he strives to make his naive dream of happiness and normalcy a reality.
